name: Ariel Dora Stern
content: Digital Health, Economics & Policy | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Ariel Dora Stern Digital Health, Economics & Policy The research group Digital Health, Economics & Policy, headed by Humboldt Prof. Ariel Dora Stern, focuses on interdisciplinary research at the intersection of technology management, public policy, and innovation in health care, using methods from econometrics and data science. The research group studies the regulation, strategy, and economics of health care, with a focus on emerging health care technologies and delivery modalities. Prof. Dr. Ariel Dora Stern Function Head of Digital Health, Economics & Policy Room G-3.2.11 Phone: +49 331 5509-4829 Mail: office-stern@hpi.de Office Sophie Gaedicke Office Assistant for Digital Health, Economics & Policy Phone: +49 331 5509-3466 Mail: office-stern@hpi.de About the research group HomeTeamProjectsPublicationsNews & Events Last change: 20/11/2025, Mareike-Vic Schreiber
